title: i just got demoted
body: i just got demoted because game exited me out to do a repair like its my fault or something...

replies.body: Repairs like that can happen when the client notices some damaged or missing game files, most of the time it happens from a hiccup in your connection while patching and such. You're likely to have more crashes without those files working properly, so it's good to let this repair finish up and test to make sure it worked properly in a custom game. If it keeps happening, you may need to switch to an ethernet connection during patching/repatching.
